text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea slootenii is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree endemic to Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea slootenii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33434A9784131. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33434A9784131.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
